optn_alpha - Variable in class weka.clusterers.DBACluster
Colony similarity coefficient alpha.
optn_alpha - Variable in class weka.clusterers.LFCluster
Colony similarity coefficient alpha.
optn_alsoDiagonalNeighborsForClusterSearch - Variable in class weka.clusterers.AntGridClusterer
Search also in cells diagonal to the current one for cluster members.
optn_antCycles - Variable in class weka.clusterers.LFCluster
Maximum number of ant cycles to be executed.
optn_antsAssumeGlobalAfterNumCalls - Variable in class weka.clusterers.DBACluster
Ants assume that their observation is a global phenomenon when they saw it for this number of calls in series.
optn_antsBehaviorDestructiveAfterNumFreeCycles - Variable in class weka.clusterers.LFCluster
After how many ant cycles carrying nothing the ant switches to destructive behavior.
optn_antsBehaviorDestructiveForNextPickUps - Variable in class weka.clusterers.LFCluster
How many times an ant will pick up an instance in destructive behavior before the ant switches back to normal pick up behavior.
optn_antsCallPerAntCycle - Variable in class weka.clusterers.DBACluster
How many ants are called per ant cycle.
optn_antsCallPerAntCycle - Variable in class weka.clusterers.LFCluster
How many ants should be called in one ant cycle.
optn_antsDropMemorySize - Variable in class weka.clusterers.LFCluster
Number of drop locations an ant can remember.
optn_antsDropRange - Variable in class weka.clusterers.LFCluster
The ant drop range is the area in which ants can drop instances they carry.
optn_antsMaxAntCycles - Variable in class weka.clusterers.DBACluster
How many ant cycles should be executed maximum.
optn_antsNum - Variable in class weka.clusterers.DBACluster
Number of ants.
optn_antsNum - Variable in class weka.clusterers.LFCluster
Number of ants on the grid.
optn_antsSpeedDistributionLimit - Variable in class weka.clusterers.LFCluster
Maximum ant speed, how many steps an ant can make on the grid in one turn.
optn_antsViewRange - Variable in class weka.clusterers.LFCluster
Size of the view range of ant ant or neighborhood radius s on the grid.
optn_clusterCompareMode - Variable in class weka.clusterers.AntGridClusterer
Compare mode to use for cluster comparison.
optn_distanceFunction - Variable in class weka.clusterers.AntGridClusterer
The distance function used for determining the distance between instances.
optn_distanceFunction - Variable in class weka.clusterers.DBACluster
The distance function used for determining the distance between instances.
optn_distanceFunction - Variable in class weka.clusterers.LFCluster
The distance function used for determining the distance between instances.
optn_distanceFunctionAlign - Variable in class weka.clusterers.DBACluster
This is a modifier to handle the distance calculation of difficult datasets in a different way.
optn_foiNoiseThreshold - Variable in class weka.clusterers.DBACluster
When the local similarity of an instance is below this value it is regarded as noise and not clustered.
optn_foiRaiseTolerance - Variable in class weka.clusterers.DBACluster
A raise of the local similarity value between two instances is not regarded as significant when not greater than this value.
optn_gridClusterer - Variable in class weka.clusterers.LFCluster
Clusterer that is used to explain the clusters (instance groups) on the grid.
optn_gridSizeX - Variable in class weka.clusterers.LFCluster
Width of the grid.
optn_gridSizeY - Variable in class weka.clusterers.LFCluster
Height of the grid.
optn_kd - Variable in class weka.clusterers.LFCluster
Drop down threshold constant.
optn_kdFunction - Variable in class weka.clusterers.LFCluster
Which kd function should be used.
optn_kp - Variable in class weka.clusterers.LFCluster
Pick up threshold constant.
optn_maxClusterNum - Variable in class weka.clusterers.AntGridClusterer
Maximum number of clusters in the result.
optn_maxClusterNum - Variable in class weka.clusterers.DBACluster
The maximum number of clusters in the result.
optn_maxNumNeighborEvaluation - Variable in class weka.clusterers.DBACluster
How many neighbor Instances are evaluated in the neighborhood maximum.
optn_replaceMissing - Variable in class weka.clusterers.DBACluster
Replace missing values globally?
optn_replaceMissing - Variable in class weka.clusterers.LFCluster
Replace missing values globally?
optn_s - Variable in class weka.clusterers.DBACluster
Size of the neighborhood.
optn_singleInstanceJoinEnvironmentWidth - Variable in class weka.clusterers.AntGridClusterer
Border width in grid cells around a single instance in which it can be joined to an existing cluster having more than one instance.
out_antCycles - Variable in class weka.clusterers.DBACluster
How many ant cycles were executed.
out_atAntCycleExecutionLimit - Variable in class weka.clusterers.DBACluster
Were as many ant cycles executed as allowed or less?

Clustering results.
out_clusterAssignments - Variable in class weka.clusterers.DBACluster
Assignments of the most recently clustered gridInstances to clusters.
out_clusterAssignments - Variable in class weka.clusterers.LFCluster
Assignments of the most recently clustered gridInstances to clusters.
out_gridClustererResults - Variable in class weka.clusterers.LFCluster
String output of the used gridClusterer.
out_maxNeighborhoodSize - Variable in class weka.clusterers.DBACluster
Size of the largest neighborhood during last execution.
out_numClusters - Variable in class weka.clusterers.AntGridClusterer
Cluster count of the result.
